article_title: Transition means time to dust off those political resumes
article_text:
Durham, NC (27701)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 88F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Mainly clear skies. Low 62F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author:
Douglas A. Brook

Guest columnist

og.description: In March, President Barack Obama signed the Presidential Transitions Improvement Act, which requires the outgoing president to put together a transition apparatus six months before Election Day.
